contents:
@卖西瓜的: 那第二段就是讲单点突变的啊……

"For example, an asparagine to lysine mutation at the position 319, which is located on the surface of the body domain, resulted in an increase of polymerase activity and adaptation of an avian influenza virus to a mammalian host"

这里给出了突变位置，以及相应的核酸变化，这不是对应你的论点吗？

最后，只有事实说不过别人的人，才会扣别人帽子说“混工资”。
